Package net.grabsalot.business

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Cacher
    Static class that stores data and returns it.
    CollectionLoader  
    CollectionTreeNode
    The node element for the JTree that displays the collection contents.
    Configuration
    Singleton class that holds configuration settings.
    Constants
    Class containing constants that are not part of the applications logic, and are only used for programming.
    IconFactory
    Icon factory used to create icons for collection tree nodes.
    Logger
    A singletonized Logger class
    MainToolbarActions
    The ActionListener for the MainToolbar.
    Playlist  
    Rule
    Specifies various rules on how the application works.
    RuleSet
    The abstract class that holds and manager rules.
    WindowClosingAdapter
    A window listener that checks the state of frames, and acts accordingly.
    XmlTransformHelper
